headline: Lowe’s (LOW): Exploring Valuation as Shares Drift Without Clear Catalyst
summary: If you’ve been tracking Lowe's Companies (LOW) lately, you might be wondering what’s been driving its stock movements. There hasn’t been a headline-making event to explain the ups and downs, which sometimes makes the action even more interesting. It seems like the shares are drifting without a clear catalyst, sparking a round of questions for anyone thinking about their next move. Looking over the past year, Lowe’s Companies shares have shown some moderate gains, ticking up around 4% during...
